name: Surround The Rat
description: This is a game of cat and mouse, the protagonist of the game is a mouse, the purpose of the game is let the cat catch the mouse, but it will be surrounded by, in the process, you can't let the mouse to move to the edge or hole, otherwise you will lose. Is not very simple, yes, using your wisdom and strategy with the mouse to start the game., but it is generally not by routine the cards!
